suncertify.ui.client
Class RemoteConnectionInfoPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  suncertify.ui.client.RemoteConnectionInfoPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class RemoteConnectionInfoPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener

A panel to capture configuration for remote database connection. It contains three fields, host, service name, and service port.

isValidEntry() checks if user entries for fields are valid or not and returns boolean value accordingly.

Entry values can be set/got through setter/getter methods related to each entry.

Author:
Mohammad S. Abdellatif
See Also:
Serialized Form

isValidEntry

public boolean isValidEntry()
Checks if user entry is valid or not.

If returns true, getErrorMessage() returns null.

Returns:
true if entries are valid, otherwise, false.
